AUTHORS

Programming: 

  Jon Haggblad <jon@haeggblad.com>

Additional work:

  Birger Hedman 
  Petter Ulfberg 

Special thanks to:

  Jesper Rojestal for most of the music
  John Degerman for some of the graphics
  Markus Haggblad for some of the sounds

This game uses the Simple Direct Media Layer (SDL). For more
info about SDL check http://www.libsdl.org
